import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; export default function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); if (!cart.paymentMethod) { props.history.push("/payment"); } const toPrice = (num)=>Number(num.toFixed(2)); // 5.123 => "5.12"=>5.12 cart.ite return (

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      {cart.cartItems.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty}x ${item.price}=${item.qty * item.price}
      • ))}
); }
